thread.title: SU field hockey upset by Mercyhurst in overtime
thread.title_full: SU field hockey upset by Mercyhurst in overtime

author: Courtesy of SU Sports Information
title: SU field hockey upset by Mercyhurst in overtime
text:
SU field hockey upset by Mercyhurst in overtime Courtesy of SU Sports Information ShipNC.com | 0 comments 
The Shippensburg University field hockey team dominated play for much of Saturday afternoon, but dropped a heartbreaking overtime decision, 2-1, to Mercyhurst in a Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference (PSAC) match at Robb Sports Complex. 
Shippensburg (8-4, 3-3 PSAC) scored first when sophomore Morgan Gantz tallied her second goal of the season less than two minutes into the second half.
